dependencies.description:
ABySS is a de novo, parallel, paired-end sequence assembler that is
designed for short reads. The single-processor version is useful for
assembling genomes up to 100 Mbases in size.
dependencies.name: abyss

dependencies.description:
BLAT (BLAST-like alignment tool) is a pairwise sequence alignment
algorithm.
dependencies.name: blat

dependencies.description:
igraph is a collection of network analysis tools with the emphasis on
efficiency, portability and ease of use.
dependencies.name: py-python-igraph

description: De novo assembly of RNAseq data using ABySS
name: transabyss

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
